resources.string: What you want to remember today?
Your device does not support this feature
No Notes Found. Please create a new Note.

1. To Add a note click on the Pencil icon to the top right corner in the Homepage.
 2. To save a note to External storage click on the Save icon in the top right corner while ADDING a note.
 3. To use the Smart Alarm, just specify @time and @date annotations followed by time and date in the note body and the app will detect alarm automatically.
 4. The format for time should be HH:MM and 24 hrs format. Please dont specify Am/Pm.
 5. The format for date is DD-MM-YY and allowed sperators are period(.), slash(/) and Hyphen(-).
 6. If the @date annotation is missing then by default the alarm is set for today.
 7. The @time is necessary for alarm to be set.
 8. To delete a note, click on the note from Homepage and click on the Delete icon in the top right corner of the pagen 9. A note can only be searched by its tag names. A note cannot be searched by Title, Body and Priority.
 10. To search a note, click on the Search icon in the Homepage.
